List of the early church fathers:

  • St. Alexander of Alexandria
    1. -Epistle on the Arian Heresy and the Deposition of Arius
  • Alexander of Lycopolis
    1. -Of the Manicheans
  • St.Ambros [Doctorate]
    1. -Of the Manicheans
  • Aphrahat/Aphraates
    1. -Demonstrations
  • Archelaus
    1. -Acts of the Disputation with the Heresiarch Manes
